section.title: __HAL_DMA_CLEAR_FLAG

para.para: Clear the DMA Stream pending flags.

entry.para:
specifies the flag to clear. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
DMA_FLAG_TCIFx: Transfer complete flag.
DMA_FLAG_HTIFx: Half transfer complete flag.
DMA_FLAG_TEIFx: Transfer error flag.
DMA_FLAG_DMEIFx: Direct mode error flag.
DMA_FLAG_FEIFx: FIFO error flag. Where x can be 0_4, 1_5, 2_6 or 3_7 to select the DMA Stream flag.

section.title: __HAL_DMA_DISABLE
section.para: Definition at line 449 of file stm32f4xx_hal_dma.h.

section.title: __HAL_DMA_DISABLE_IT

para.para: Disable the specified DMA Stream interrupts.

entry.para:
specifies the DMA interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
DMA_IT_TC: Transfer complete interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_HT: Half transfer complete interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_TE: Transfer error interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_FE: FIFO error interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_DME: Direct mode error interrupt.

section.title: __HAL_DMA_ENABLE_IT

para.para: Enable the specified DMA Stream interrupts.

entry.para:
specifies the DMA interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
DMA_IT_TC: Transfer complete interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_HT: Half transfer complete interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_TE: Transfer error interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_FE: FIFO error interrupt mask.
DMA_IT_DME: Direct mode error interrupt.

section.title: __HAL_DMA_GET_FLAG

para.para: Get the DMA Stream pending flags.

entry.para:
Get the specified flag. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
DMA_FLAG_TCIFx: Transfer complete flag.
DMA_FLAG_HTIFx: Half transfer complete flag.
DMA_FLAG_TEIFx: Transfer error flag.
DMA_FLAG_DMEIFx: Direct mode error flag.
DMA_FLAG_FEIFx: FIFO error flag. Where x can be 0_4, 1_5, 2_6 or 3_7 to select the DMA Stream flag.

section.para: Definition at line 566 of file stm32f4xx_hal_dma.h.

section.title: __HAL_DMA_GET_FS

para.para: Return the current DMA Stream FIFO filled level.

entry.para:
FIFO filling state.
DMA_FIFOStatus_Less1QuarterFull: when FIFO is less than 1 quarter-full and not empty.
DMA_FIFOStatus_1QuarterFull: if more than 1 quarter-full.
DMA_FIFOStatus_HalfFull: if more than 1 half-full.
DMA_FIFOStatus_3QuartersFull: if more than 3 quarters-full.
DMA_FIFOStatus_Empty: when FIFO is empty
DMA_FIFOStatus_Full: when FIFO is full

section.para: Definition at line 421 of file stm32f4xx_hal_dma.h.

section.title: __HAL_DMA_SET_COUNTER

para.para: Writes the number of data units to be transferred on the DMA Stream.

entry.para: Number of data units to be transferred (from 0 to 65535) Number of data items depends only on the Peripheral data format.

note.title: Note
note.para: If Peripheral data format is Bytes: number of data units is equal to total number of bytes to be transferred.

If Peripheral data format is Half-Word: number of data units is
equal to total number of bytes to be transferred / 2.
If Peripheral data format is Word: number of data units is equal to total number of bytes to be transferred / 4.

entry.para: number of remaining data units in the current DMAy Streamx transfer.
